ProjectTitle: Elucidating the role of astrocytes in noradrenaline-mediated seizure suppression and its possible therapeutic relevance for Alzheimer's disease.
InitialFeedbackHistory:
14/07/2022
5. Storage: please answer the first 2 questions about data storage and backup 
7. Sharing: have you considered using repositories for data preservation and sharing, maybe a disciplinary repository such as ebrains (https://search.kg.ebrains.eu/) or OpenNeuro (https://openneuro.org/) could be suitable? For data for which there is no good disciplinary repository you can use KU Leuven RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr)
